verses.verse: Surely <S%H3588><s%> there <S%H3426>is<s%> a <S%H4161>vein<s%> for the <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and a <S%H4725>place<s%> for <S%H2091>gold<s%> where they <S%H2212>fine<s%> it.
Iron <S%H1270><s%> is <S%H3947>taken<s%> out of the <S%H4480>earth,<s%> <S%H6083><s%> and <S%H5154>brass<s%> is <S%H6694>molten<s%> out of the <S%H68>stone.<s%>

He <S%H7760>setteth<s%> an <S%H7093>end<s%> to <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> and searcheth <S%H2713>out<s%> <S%H1931><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H8503>perfection:<s%> the <S%H68>stones<s%> of <S%H652>darkness,<s%> and the shadow of <S%H6757>death.<s%>

The <S%H5158>flood<s%> breaketh <S%H6555>out<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5973><s%> the <S%H1481>inhabitant;<s%> even the waters <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H7272>foot:<s%> they are dried <S%H1809>up,<s%> they are gone <S%H5128>away<s%> from <S%H4480>men.<s%> <S%H582><s%>
As for the <S%H776>earth,<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> it <S%H3318>cometh<s%> <S%H3899>bread:<s%> and <S%H8478>under<s%> it is turned <S%H2015>up<s%> as it <S%H3644>were<s%> <S%H784>fire.<s%>
The <S%H68>stones<s%> of it are the <S%H4725>place<s%> of <S%H5601>sapphires:<s%> and it hath <S%H6083>dust<s%> of <S%H2091>gold.<s%>
There is a <S%H5410>path<s%> which <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5861>fowl<s%> <S%H3045>knoweth,<s%> and which the <S%H344>vulture's<s%> <S%H5869>eye<s%> hath <S%H3808>not<s%> seen: <S%H7805><s%>
The <S%H7830>lion's<s%> <S%H1121>whelps<s%> have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1869>trodden<s%> it, <S%H3808>nor<s%> the fierce <S%H7826>lion<s%> <S%H5710>passed<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> it.
He putteth <S%H7971>forth<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> upon the <S%H2496>rock;<s%> he <S%H2015>overturneth<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> by the <S%H4480>roots.<s%> <S%H8328><s%>
He cutteth <S%H1234>out<s%> <S%H2975>rivers<s%> among the <S%H6697>rocks;<s%> and his <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H7200>seeth<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> precious <S%H3366>thing.<s%>
He <S%H2280>bindeth<s%> the <S%H5104>floods<s%> from <S%H4480>overflowing;<s%> <S%H1065><s%> and the thing that is <S%H8587>hid<s%> bringeth he <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H216>light.<s%>
But <S%H4480>where<s%> <S%H370><s%> shall <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> be <S%H4672>found?<s%> and <S%H335>where<s%> <S%H2088><s%> is the <S%H4725>place<s%> of <S%H998>understanding?<s%>
Man <S%H582><s%> <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> the <S%H6187>price<s%> thereof; <S%H3808>neither<s%> is it <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living.<s%>
The <S%H8415>depth<s%> <S%H559>saith,<s%> <S%H1931>It<s%> is <S%H3808>not<s%> in me: and the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H559>saith,<s%> It is <S%H369>not<s%> <S%H5978>with<s%> me.

It <S%H3808>cannot<s%> be <S%H5414>gotten<s%> for <S%H2091>gold,<s%> <S%H5462><s%> <S%H8478><s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall <S%H3701>silver<s%> be <S%H8254>weighed<s%> for the <S%H4242>price<s%> thereof.
It <S%H3808>cannot<s%> be <S%H5541>valued<s%> with the <S%H3800>gold<s%> of <S%H211>Ophir,<s%> with the <S%H3368>precious<s%> <S%H7718>onyx,<s%> or the <S%H5601>sapphire.<s%>
The <S%H2091>gold<s%> and the <S%H2137>crystal<s%> <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H6186>equal<s%> it: and the <S%H8545>exchange<s%> of it shall not be for <S%H3627>jewels<s%> of fine <S%H6337>gold.<s%>
No <S%H3808><s%> mention shall be <S%H2142>made<s%> of <S%H7215>coral,<s%> or of <S%H1378>pearls:<s%> for the <S%H4901>price<s%> of <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> is above <S%H4480>rubies.<s%> <S%H6443><s%>
The <S%H6357>topaz<s%> of <S%H3568>Ethiopia<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6186>equal<s%> it, <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall it be <S%H5541>valued<s%> with <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H3800>gold.<s%>
Whence <S%H4480><s%> <S%H370><s%> then <S%H935>cometh<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom?<s%> and <S%H335>where<s%> <S%H2088><s%> is the <S%H4725>place<s%> of <S%H998>understanding?<s%>

Seeing it is <S%H5956>hid<s%> from the <S%H4480>eyes<s%> <S%H5869><s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2416>living,<s%> and kept <S%H5641>close<s%> from the <S%H4480>fowls<s%> <S%H5775><s%> of the <S%H8064>air.<s%>
Destruction <S%H11><s%> and <S%H4194>death<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> We have <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H8088>fame<s%> thereof with our <S%H241>ears.<s%>
God <S%H430><s%> <S%H995>understandeth<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> thereof, and <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> thereof.
For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H5027>looketh<s%> to the <S%H7098>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H7200>seeth<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H8064>heaven;<s%>
To <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H4948>weight<s%> for the <S%H7307>winds;<s%> and he <S%H8505>weigheth<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> by <S%H4060>measure.<s%>
When he <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H2706>decree<s%> for the <S%H4306>rain,<s%> and a <S%H1870>way<s%> for the <S%H2385>lightning<s%> of the thunder: <S%H6963><s%>
Then <S%H227><s%> did he <S%H7200>see<s%> it, and <S%H5608>declare<s%> it; he <S%H3559>prepared<s%> it, <S%H1571>yea,<s%> and searched it <S%H2713>out.<s%>

And unto <S%H120>man<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord,<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> is <S%H2451>wisdom;<s%> and to <S%H5493>depart<s%> from <S%H4480>evil<s%> <S%H7451><s%> is <S%H998>understanding.<s%>
